verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H314>last<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H5002>says,<s%> the <S%H1397>man<s%> who was <S%H6965>raised<s%> on <S%H5920>high<s%> <S%H5002>says,<s%> the <S%H4899>anointed<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> the <S%H5273>sweet<s%> <S%H2158>psalmist<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>
"The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> by <S%H4405>me.<s%> His word was on my <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>

The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> the <S%H6697>Rock<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4910>me,<s%> 'One who rules over <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H6662>righteously,<s%> who <S%H4910>rules<s%> in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%>

shall be as the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>rises,<s%> a <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H5645>clouds,<s%> when the tender <S%H1877>grass<s%> springs out of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> through clear <S%H5051>shining<s%> after <S%H4306>rain.<s%>'

Most certainly my <S%H1004>house<s%> is not so with <S%H410>God,<s%> yet he has <S%H7760>made<s%> with me an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H6186>ordered<s%> in all <S%H8104>things,<s%> and sure, for it is all my <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> and all my <S%H2656>desire,<s%> although he <S%H6779>doesn't<s%> make it grow.
But all of the <S%H1100>ungodly<s%> shall be as <S%H6975>thorns<s%> to be thrust <S%H5074>away,<s%> because they <S%H3947>can't<s%> be taken with the <S%H3027>hand,<s%>

But the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H5060>touches<s%> them must be <S%H4390>armed<s%> with <S%H1270>iron<s%> and the <S%H6086>staff<s%> of a <S%H2595>spear.<s%> They shall be <S%H8313>utterly<s%> <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> in their <S%H7675>place.<s%>"

These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> whom <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7675>had:<s%> Josheb Basshebeth <S%H3427>a<s%> <S%H8461>Tahchemonite,<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7991>captains;<s%> the same was <S%H5722>Adino<s%> the <S%H6112>Eznite,<s%> against <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> at <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6471>time.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> him was <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodai<s%> the son of an <S%H266>Ahohite,<s%> one of the <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> with <S%H1732>David,<s%> when they <S%H2778>defied<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> who were there gathered <S%H622>together<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were gone <S%H5927>away.<s%>

He <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3588>until<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H3021>weary,<s%> and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H1692>froze<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>worked<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>victory<s%> that <S%H3117>day;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him only to take <S%H6584>spoil.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> him was <S%H8048>Shammah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H89>Agee<s%> a <S%H2043>Hararite.<s%> The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were gathered <S%H622>together<s%> into a <S%H2416>troop,<s%> where there was a <S%H2513>plot<s%> of <S%H7704>ground<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5742>lentils;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

But he <S%H3320>stood<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H2513>plot,<s%> and <S%H5337>defended<s%> <S%H5221>it,<s%> and killed the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>worked<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>victory.<s%>

<S%H7969>Three<s%> of the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> men went <S%H3381>down,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> in the harvest <S%H7105>time<s%> to the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of <S%H5725>Adullam;<s%> and the <S%H2416>troop<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> was <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>
<S%H1732>David<s%> was then in the <S%H4686>stronghold;<s%> and the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> was then in <S%H1035>Bethlehem.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H183>longed,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Oh that one would give me <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> of the <S%H953>well<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%> which is by the <S%H8179>gate!<s%>"

The <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> broke <S%H1234>through<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H7579>drew<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of the <S%H953>well<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%> that was by the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> <S%H935>it,<s%> and brought it to <S%H1732>David:<s%> but he <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> of <S%H5258>it,<s%> but poured it out to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Be it <S%H2486>far<s%> from <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh, that I should <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1818>this!<s%> Isn't it the blood of the <S%H582>men<s%> who <S%H1980>went<s%> in jeopardy of their <S%H5315>lives?<s%>" Therefore he <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H7969>it.<s%> The three mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> did these <S%H6213>things.<s%>

<S%H52>Abishai,<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah,<s%> was <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7992>three.<s%> He lifted <S%H5782>up<s%> his <S%H2595>spear<s%> against <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2491>killed<s%> <S%H8034>them,<s%> and had a name among the <S%H7969>three.<s%>
<S%H3513>Wasn't<s%> he most honorable of the <S%H7969>three?<s%> therefore he was made their <S%H8269>captain:<s%> however he <S%H935>didn't<s%> attain to the <S%H7969>three.<s%>

<S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H6909>Kabzeel,<s%> who had done <S%H7227>mighty<s%> <S%H6467>deeds,<s%> he <S%H5221>killed<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H739>sons<s%> of Ariel of <S%H4124>Moab:<s%> he went <S%H3381>down<s%> also and <S%H5221>killed<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of a <S%H953>pit<s%> in <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7950>snow.<s%>

He <S%H2026>killed<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> a <S%H4758>goodly<s%> <S%H376>man:<s%> and the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> had a <S%H2595>spear<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> but he went <S%H3381>down<s%> to him with a <S%H7626>staff,<s%> and <S%H1497>plucked<s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> out of the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5221>killed<s%> him with his own <S%H2595>spear.<s%>
<S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> these <S%H8034>things,<s%> and had a name among the <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men.<s%>
He was more <S%H3513>honorable<s%> than the <S%H7970>thirty,<s%> but he <S%H935>didn't<s%> attain to the <S%H7969>three.<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> him over his <S%H4928>guard.<s%>
<S%H6214>Asahel<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%> was one of the <S%H7970>thirty;<s%> <S%H445>Elhanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%>
<S%H8048>Shammah<s%> the <S%H2733>Harodite,<s%> <S%H470>Elika<s%> the <S%H2733>Harodite,<s%>
<S%H2503>Helez<s%> the <S%H6407>Paltite,<s%> <S%H5896>Ira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6142>Ikkesh<s%> the <S%H8621>Tekoite,<s%>
<S%H44>Abiezer<s%> the <S%H6069>Anathothite,<s%> <S%H4012>Mebunnai<s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite,<s%>
<S%H6756>Zalmon<s%> the <S%H266>Ahohite,<s%> <S%H4121>Maharai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite,<s%>

<S%H2460>Heleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1196>Baanah<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite,<s%> <S%H863>Ittai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7380>Ribai<s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%>
<S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> a <S%H6553>Pirathonite,<s%> <S%H1914>Hiddai<s%> of the <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H1608>Gaash.<s%>
<S%H45>Abialbon<s%> the <S%H6164>Arbathite,<s%> <S%H5820>Azmaveth<s%> the <S%H1273>Barhumite,<s%>
<S%H455>Eliahba<s%> the <S%H8170>Shaalbonite,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3464>Jashen,<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%>
<S%H8048>Shammah<s%> the <S%H2043>Hararite,<s%> <S%H279>Ahiam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8325>Sharar<s%> the <S%H2043>Ararite,<s%>

<S%H467>Eliphelet<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H308>Ahasbai,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H4602>Maacathite,<s%> <S%H463>Eliam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> the <S%H1526>Gilonite,<s%>
<S%H2695>Hezro<s%> the <S%H3761>Carmelite,<s%> <S%H6474>Paarai<s%> the <S%H701>Arbite,<s%>
<S%H3008>Igal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah,<s%> <S%H1137>Bani<s%> the <S%H1425>Gadite,<s%>
<S%H6768>Zelek<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite,<s%> <S%H5171>Naharai<s%> the <S%H886>Beerothite,<s%> armor <S%H5375>bearers<s%> to <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah,<s%>
<S%H5896>Ira<s%> the <S%H3505>Ithrite,<s%> <S%H1619>Gareb<s%> the <S%H3505>Ithrite,<s%>
<S%H223>Uriah<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite:<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - seven in <S%H7651>all.<s%>
